targets.query:
from(bucket: "Laboratorio")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TP_Totalizador")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "L1 Voltaje" or r["_field"] == "L2 Voltaje" or r["_field"] == "L3 Voltaje")

from(bucket: "Laboratorio")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "TP_Totalizador")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "L1-L2 Voltaje" or r["_field"] == "L2-L3 Voltaje" or r["_field"] == "L3-L1 Voltaje")

from(bucket: "Laboratorio")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "L1 Corriente" or r["_field"] == "L2 Corriente" or r["_field"] == "L3 Corriente")
